content.body: I'm starting to draft spec text for the [Intl.MessageFormat proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-intl-messageformat), and thought I'd check: Is there anything like a style guide available for ECMA-262/ECMA-402, or is that "just" implicit from what the specs currently look like? I recall some vague conversations about such a thing, but now I can't be sure if those were of a thing that actually exists already.
